column1: #text=When I go grocery shopping it is usually pretty hectic .
#text=Right now I ca n't drive , so I have to find a ride there .
#text=I also have to make sure that I find someone who has a car that my two children will fit in as well .
#text=So , after finding a way to get there , I get a cart wiped down and put my youngest in the seat .
#text=Of course , if there happens to be a car cart , we have to take that one so both kids can sit inside .
#text=If I remembered to bring my list , I get all of the stuff on it first .
#text=I always grab other things as I see them and realize I need them .
#text=It can be a good thing , or a bad thing .
#text=We usually end up with quite a bit more than I intended , but since I ca n't go to the store whenever I want , I usually justify it to myself .
#text=So , we get into the check out line and of course I have to tell my oldest child we ca n't get every candy he sees in the aisle while we are waiting .
#text=After we check out , we go outside and I get the kiddos in first .
#text=Then to bring our shopping trip to an end , I puzzle piece everything into the back of our car and return the cart .
